titles: Considerations touching the likeliest means to remove hirelings out of the church wherein is also discourc'd of tithes, church-fees, church-revenues, and whether any maintenance of ministers can be settl'd by law / the author J.M.
author: Milton, John, 1608-1674.
publisher: Printed by T.N. for L. Chapman ...,
notes: Attributed to John Milton. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Item incorrectly identified in reel guide as M2108.
keywords: Church of England --  Clergy --  Salaries, etc.
